TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAssertion extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a Security Assertion Markup Language 1.1 (SAML 1.1) assertion.

span.span: Represents a Security Assertion Markup Language 1.1 (SAML 1.1) assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类对应于 OASIS SAML 1.1 规范中定义的 `` XML 元素。The class corresponds to the `` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification. 安全令牌的声明包含在 中。The claims for security tokens are contained within a . 具有一组可扩展的声明，这些声明称为 SAML 语句，由 属性表示。A has an extensible set of claims known as SAML statements that are represented by the property. 颁发 SAML 断言的 SAML 授权机构在 属性中指定。The SAML authority that issued the SAML assertion is specified in the property.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this assertion was deserialized from XML source and can re-emit the XML data unchanged.

value.span: 如果此断言可以再次发出 XML 源数据保持不变;否则为。

span.span: if this assertion can re-emit the XML source data unchanged; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现会保留使用读取源数据方法，并可以重新发出原始数据，只要属性已改变的断言已读取的时间。The default implementation preserves the source data when read using the method and can re-emit the original data as long as the property has not changed from the time that assertion was read. > [!IMPORTANT] > 它是非常重要的 SAML 断言使用不同的数据具有不同的 Id。It is very important that SAML assertions with different data have different IDs. 如果实施的方案，由此加载断言"模板"并填充的数据的某些位，则必须更改 Id。If implementing a scheme whereby an assertion "template" is loaded and certain bits of data are filled in, the Id must be changed.

summary.span: Gets or sets the security credentials that are used to digitally sign the SAML assertion.

span.span: Gets or sets the security credentials that are used to digitally sign the SAML assertion.

value.span: 一个 ，它用于对 SAML 断言进行数字签名。

span.span: A that is used to digitally sign the SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示在将 SAML 断言序列化为 XML 时用来对其进行签名的凭据。The property represents the credentials that are used to sign a SAML assertion when it is serialized into XML. 同样， 属性表示对传入的 SOAP 消息中的 SAML 令牌进行签名的安全令牌。Similarly, the property represents the security token that signed a SAML token in an incoming SOAP message.

exception.span: The property is and an attempt is made to set the property.

span.span: The property is and an attempt is made to set the property.

summary.span: Gets the security token contained in or referenced by a digitally signed SAML assertion.

span.span: Gets the security token contained in or referenced by a digitally signed SAML assertion.

value.span: 一个由数字签名的 SAML 断言包含或引用的 。

span.span: A contained in or referenced by a digitally signed SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用 方法且 SAML 断言已进行数字签名，则数字签名被设置为 属性。When the method is called and a SAML assertion is digitally signed, the digital signature is set to the property. 如果 SAML 断言未进行数字签名，则 属性的值为 `null`。When the SAML assertion is not digitally signed, the value of the property is `null`.

span.span: An of type that contains the SAML statements associated with the SAML assertion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 来设置与 SAML 断言相关联的 SAML 语句，或者如果 属性为 `false`，则将该语句直接添加到此属性所返回的集合中。Use the to set the SAML statements associated with a SAML assertion or add it directly to the collection that is returned by this property when the property is `false`. 下表将 OASIS SAML 断言和协议规范中定义的三种类型的 SAML 语句分别映射到它们各自的类型。The following table maps the three types of SAML statements defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification to their respective types. |语句类型Statement Type|CLR 类型CLR Type| |--------------------|--------------| |身份验证Authentication|| |特性Attribute|| |授权决定Authorization decision|| |扩展架构中定义的语句Statement defined in an extension schema|| |扩展架构中定义的主题语句Subject statement defined in an extension schema||
